name: snail-bot
description: a moderation and logging bot made for the snail discord server

scripts.start: npm install && npm run lint && tsc && node .
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n Deps,Backend -c green,blue "npm run dev:deps" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: tsc && cross-conf-env docker-compose up --build bot workercheck
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently --kill-others -n Deps,Backend -c green,blue "npm run dev:deps" "nodemon --watch src -e ts,json --exec \"npm run dev:backend\""

author: ElementalMP4
